Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: unakee nigaahen jhukee huee hongee, zillat (apamaan) unapar chha rahee hogee. unhen us samay bhee sajada karane ke lie bulaaya jaata tha jab ve bhale-change the
atah tum mujhe chhod do aur usako jo is vaanee ko jhuthalaata hai. ham aison ko kramashah (vinaash kee or) le jaenge, aise tareeqe se ki ve nahin jaanate
main unhen dheel de raha hoon. nishchay hee meree chaal badee mazaboot hai
(kya ve yaatana hee chaahate hain) ya tum unase koee badala maang rahe ho ki ve taavaan ke bojh se dabe jaate hon
ya unake paas paroksh ka gyaan hai to ve likh rahe hain
to apane rab ke aadesh hetu dhairy se kaam lo aur machhaleevaale (yoonus alaià¥°) kee tarah na ho jaana, jabaki usane pukaara tha is dasha mein ki vah gam mein ghut raha tha.
yadi usake rab kee anukampa usake saath na ho jaatee to vah avashy hee chatiyal maidaan mein bure haal mein daal diya jaata.
antatah usake rab ne use chun liya aur use achchhe logon mein sammilit kar diya
jab ve log, jinhonne inakaar kiya, zikr (quraan) sunate hai aur kahate hai, "vah to deevaana hai!" to aisa lagata hai ki ve apanee nigaahon ke zor se tumhen phisala denge
haalaanki vah saare sansaar ke lie ek anusmrti hai
aur tum kya jaano ki kya hai vah hokar rahanevaalee
samood aur aad ne us khadakhada denevaalee (ghatana) ko jhuthalaaya
phir samood to ek had se badh jaanevaalee aapada se vinasht kie gae
aur rahe aad, to ve ek aniyantrit prachand vaayu se vinasht kar die gae
allaah ne usako saat raat aur aath din tak unmoolan ke uddeshy se unapar lagae rakha. to logon ko tum dekhate ki ve usamen pachhaade hue aise pade hai maano ve khajoor ke jarjar tane hon
ab kya tumhen unamen se koee shesh dikhaee deta hai
